keynotesComing: Keynote lectures are talks delivered by prominent Canadian mathematicians or industry figures. They can range from introductions to areas of mathematics, explaining how a particular problem or conjecture was resolved, or the role mathematics plays in specific applications. They are a hightlight of the conference.
keynoteInquiries: If you know someone who may be interested in delivering a keynote lecture, or are interested in giving one yourself, feel free to contact us.
